channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39086|2024-08-04T01:58:17.678Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.5, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.0.4, and 6.1.1.0 through 6.1.1.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 215889.

item.title: CVE-2021-39026|2024-08-04T01:58:17.503Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 5.0.0.2 and 5.0.0.3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 213964.

item.title: CVE-2021-38983|2024-08-04T01:51:20.757Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, and 4.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 212792.

item.title: CVE-2021-39013|2024-08-04T01:58:17.565Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20security
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Security (CP4S) 1.7.2.0, 1.7.1.0, and 1.7.0.0 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information in HTTP responses that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 213651.

item.title: CVE-2021-39064|2024-08-04T01:58:17.708Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20copy%20data%20management
item.description: IBM Spectrum Copy Data Management 2.2.13 and earlier has weak authentication and password rules and incorrectly handles default credentials for the Spectrum Copy Data Management Admin console. IBM X-Force ID: 214957.

item.title: CVE-2021-38980|2024-08-04T01:51:20.917Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager (IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager) 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, and 4.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 212786.

item.title: CVE-2021-38937|2024-08-04T01:51:20.320Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW940, FW950, and FW1010 could allow an authenticated user to cause the system to crash using a specially crafted IBMi Hypervisor call. IBM X-Force ID: 210894.

item.title: CVE-2021-39046|2024-08-04T01:58:17.584Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0, and 21.0 and IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a lprivileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 214346.

item.title: CVE-2021-38879|2024-08-04T01:51:20.819Z -- ibm -- jazz%20team%20server
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 209057.

item.title: CVE-2021-39077|2024-08-04T01:58:17.647Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description:
IBM Security Guardium 10.5, 10.6, 11.0, 11.1, 11.2, 11.3, and 11.4 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 215587.
â€ƒ

item.title: CVE-2021-38869|2024-08-04T01:51:20.504Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some situations may not automatically log users out after they exceede their idle timeout. IBM X-Force ID: 208341.

item.title: CVE-2021-38918|2024-08-04T01:51:20.877Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW860, FW940, FW950, and FW1010, through a specific sequence of VM management operations could lead to a violation of the isolation between peer VMs. IBM X-Force ID: 210019.

item.title: CVE-2021-38939|2024-08-04T01:51:20.603Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by an user with access to creating domains. IBM X-Force ID: 211037.

item.title: CVE-2021-38949|2024-08-04T01:51:20.731Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ 7.5, 8.0, 9.0 LTS, 9.1 CD, and 9.1 LTS stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 211403.

item.title: CVE-2021-38909|2024-08-04T01:51:20.916Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 209706.

item.title: CVE-2021-38974|2024-08-04T01:51:20.855Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, and 4.1 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service using specially crafted HTTP requests. IBM X-Force ID: 212779.

item.title: CVE-2021-39074|2024-08-04T01:58:17.688Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2021-38948|2024-08-04T01:51:20.616Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 211402.

item.title: CVE-2021-39036|2024-08-04T01:58:17.225Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1 and 11.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 213966.

item.title: CVE-2021-38900|2024-08-04T01:51:20.879Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 and IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0 and 21.0 could allow a privileged user to obtain highly sensitive information due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 209607.

item.title: CVE-2021-38947|2024-08-04T01:51:20.832Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20copy%20data%20management
item.description: IBM Spectrum Copy Data Management 2.2.13 and earlier uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 211242.

item.title: CVE-2021-39024|2024-08-04T01:58:17.274Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0.0 and 5.0.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 213862.

item.title: CVE-2021-39055|2024-08-04T01:58:17.310Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20copy%20data%20management
item.description: IBM Spectrum Copy Data Management 2.2.0.0 through 2.2.14.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 214534.

item.title: CVE-2021-38887|2024-08-04T01:51:20.915Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from application response requests that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 209401.

item.title: CVE-2021-39002|2024-08-04T01:58:17.681Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2021-39023|2024-08-04T01:58:17.630Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0 and 5.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 213860.

item.title: CVE-2021-39015|2024-08-04T01:58:17.414Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 213655.

item.title: CVE-2021-38981|2024-08-04T01:51:20.704Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, and 4.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 212788.

item.title: CVE-2021-39063|2024-08-04T01:58:18.103Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0.0 through 10.1.8.x uses Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) which could allow an attacker to carry out privileged actions and retrieve sensitive information due to a misconfiguration in access control headers. IBM X-Force ID: 214956.

item.title: CVE-2021-38957|2024-08-04T01:51:20.853Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify 10.0.0, 10.0.1.0, and 10.0.2.0 could disclose sensitive information due to hazardous input validation during QR code generation. IBM X-Force ID: 212040.

item.title: CVE-2021-39076|2024-08-04T01:58:17.638Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 10.5 and 11.3 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 215585.

item.title: CVE-2021-39051|2024-08-04T01:58:17.594Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20copy%20data%20management
item.description: IBM Spectrum Copy Data Management 2.2.0.0 through 2.2.14.3 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused by improper input of application server registration function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the host address and port fields of the application server registration form in the portal UI to enumerate and attack services that are running on those hosts. IBM X-Force ID: 214441.

item.title: CVE-2021-38993|2024-08-04T01:58:17.573Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the smbcd daemon to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 212962.

item.title: CVE-2021-39028|2024-08-04T01:58:17.677Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 213866.

item.title: CVE-2021-38961|2024-08-04T01:51:20.705Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OPENBMC OP910 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 212049.

item.title: CVE-2021-38872|2024-08-04T01:51:20.273Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.2.0, 10.0.3.0, 10.0.1.0 through 10.0.1.4, and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.17 could allow a remote user to cause a denial of service by consuming resources with multiple requests. IBM X-Force ID: 208348.

item.title: CVE-2021-38923|2024-08-04T01:51:20.506Z -- ibm -- powervm%20hypervisor
item.description: IBM PowerVM Hypervisor FW1010 could allow a privileged user to gain access to another VM due to assigning duplicate WWPNs. IBM X-Force ID: 210162.

item.title: CVE-2021-39006|2024-08-04T01:58:17.304Z -- ibm -- qradar%20wincollect%20agent
item.description: IBM QRadar WinCollect Agent 10.0 and 10.0.1 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information due to missing best practices. IBM X-Force ID: 213549.

item.title: CVE-2021-38933|2024-08-04T01:51:20.710Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Aexpress%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct for UNIX 1.5 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 210574.

item.title: CVE-2021-38999|2024-08-04T01:58:16.516Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information by inclusion of sensitive data within trace.

item.title: CVE-2021-39035|2024-08-04T01:58:17.599Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.5, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.0.4, and 6.1.1.0 through 6.1.1.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 213965.

item.title: CVE-2021-38896|2024-08-04T01:51:20.807Z -- ibm -- qradar%20advisor
item.description: IBM QRadar Advisor 2.5 through 2.6.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 209566.

item.title: CVE-2021-39082|2024-08-04T01:58:17.858Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.1.1.2 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2021-38997|2024-08-04T01:58:17.566Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect V10.0.0.0 through V10.0.5.0, V10.0.1.0 through V10.0.1.7, and V2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.19 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 213212.

item.title: CVE-2021-38859|2024-08-04T01:51:20.324Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege On-Premises 11.5 could allow a user to obtain version number information using a specially crafted HTTP request that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 207899.

item.title: CVE-2021-39017|2024-08-04T01:58:16.523Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 213725.

item.title: CVE-2021-39009|2024-08-04T01:58:17.684Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 213554.

item.title: CVE-2021-38946|2024-08-04T01:51:20.687Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 211240.

item.title: CVE-2021-38894|2024-08-04T01:51:20.734Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify 10.0.0, 10.0.1.0, and 10.0.2.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 209515.

item.title: CVE-2021-39049|2024-08-04T01:58:17.927Z -- ibm -- i2%20analyst%27s%20notebook
item.description: IBM i2 Analyst's Notebook 9.2.0, 9.2.1, and 9.2.2 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and gain lower level privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 214439.

item.title: CVE-2021-39085|2024-08-04T01:58:17.201Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.5, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.0.4, and 6.1.1.0 through 6.1.1.1 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 215888.

item.title: CVE-2021-39019|2024-08-04T01:58:17.782Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 could disclose highly sensitive information through an HTTP GET request to an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 213728.

item.title: CVE-2021-38990|2024-08-04T01:58:16.505Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the mount command which could lead to code execution. IBM X-Force ID: 212952.

item.title: CVE-2021-39022|2024-08-04T01:58:17.364Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0.0 and 5.0.0.0 saves user-provided information into a Comma-Separated Value (CSV) file, but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could be interpreted as a command when the file is opened by spreadsheet software. IBM X-Force ID: 213858.

item.title: CVE-2021-38864|2024-08-04T01:51:20.837Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20bridge
item.description: IBM Security Verify Bridge 1.0.5.0 could allow a user to obtain sensitive information due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 208155.

item.title: CVE-2021-38955|2024-08-04T01:51:20.734Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user with elevated privileges to cause a denial of service due to a file creation vulnerability in the audit commands. IBM X-Force ID: 211825.

item.title: CVE-2021-38935|2024-08-04T01:51:20.910Z -- ibm -- maximo%20asset%20management
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6.1.2 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 210892.

item.title: CVE-2021-39079|2024-08-04T01:58:17.767Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics%20mobile
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics Mobile for Android applications prior to version 1.1.14 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 215592.

item.title: CVE-2021-38870|2024-08-04T01:51:20.453Z -- ibm -- aspera
item.description: IBM Aspera Cloud is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 208343.

item.title: CVE-2021-38927|2024-08-04T01:51:20.879Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 210322.

item.title: CVE-2021-38882|2024-08-04T01:51:20.856Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20scale
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale 5.1.0 through 5.1.1.1 could allow a privileged admin to destroy filesystem audit logging records before expiration time. IBM X-Force ID: 209164.

item.title: CVE-2021-39057|2024-08-04T01:58:17.622Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20plus
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Plus 10.1.0.0 through 10.1.8.x is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 214616.

item.title: CVE-2021-38875|2024-08-04T01:51:20.613Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ 8.0, 9.0 LTS, 9.1 LTS, 9.2 LTS, 9.1 CD, and 9.2 CD is vulnerable to a denial of service attack caused by an error processing messages. IBM X-Force ID: 208398.

item.title: CVE-2021-39020|2024-08-04T01:58:17.327Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0.7 and lower stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 213855.

item.title: CVE-2021-38873|2024-08-04T01:51:20.475Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is potentially vulnerable to CSV Injection. A remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-Force ID: 208396.

item.title: CVE-2021-38893|2024-08-04T01:51:20.703Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20automation
item.description: IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 and IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20.0 and 21.0 are vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 209512.

item.title: CVE-2021-38863|2024-08-04T01:51:20.558Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20bridge
item.description: IBM Security Verify Bridge 1.0.5.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a locally authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 208154.

item.title: CVE-2021-39043|2024-08-04T01:58:17.997Z -- ibm -- jazz%20team%20server
item.description: IBM Jazz Team Server 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 214032.

item.title: CVE-2021-38876|2024-08-04T01:51:20.561Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 208404.

item.title: CVE-2021-39088|2024-08-04T01:58:17.738Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 is vulnerable to local privilege escalation if this could be combined with other unknown vulnerabilities then privilege escalation could be performed. IBM X-Force ID: 216111.

item.title: CVE-2021-39016|2024-08-04T01:58:17.603Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 does not sufficiently monitor or control transmitted network traffic volume, so that an actor can cause the software to transmit more traffic than should be allowed for that actor. IBM X-Force ID: 213722.

item.title: CVE-2021-38903|2024-08-04T01:51:20.740Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 209691.

item.title: CVE-2021-39011|2024-08-04T01:58:16.516Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20security
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Security (CP4S) 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.6.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 213645.

item.description: IBM i2 Analyst's Notebook 9.2.0, 9.2.1, and 9.2.2 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and gain lower level privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 214440.

item.description: IBM Spectrum Copy Data Management 2.2.13 and earlier could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 214525.

item.title: CVE-2021-38973|2024-08-04T01:51:20.715Z -- ibm -- security%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, and 4.1 receives input or data, but it does not validate or incorrectly validates that the input has the properties that are required to process the data safely and correctly.

item.title: CVE-2021-39045|2024-08-04T01:58:17.324Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 could allow a local attacker to obtain information due to the autocomplete feature on password input fields. IBM X-Force ID: 214345.

item.title: CVE-2021-38925|2024-08-04T01:51:20.870Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 5.2.0. 0 through 6.1.1.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 210171.

item.title: CVE-2021-38944|2024-08-04T01:51:20.786Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.2.0 through 1.0.3.0, 10.0.1.0 through 10.0.1.5, and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.18 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 211236.

item.title: CVE-2021-38967|2024-08-04T01:51:20.836Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.2 CD and 9.2 LTS could allow a local privileged user to inject and execute malicious code. IBM X-Force ID: 212441.

item.title: CVE-2021-39040|2024-08-04T01:58:17.332Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20workspace
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Workspace 2.0 could be vulnerable to malicious file upload by not validating the file types or sizes. Attackers can make use of this weakness and upload malicious executable files into the system and it can be sent to victim for performing further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 214025.

item.title: CVE-2021-38883|2024-08-04T01:51:20.883Z -- ibm -- business%20process%20manager
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20,0 and 21.0 and IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 209165.

item.title: CVE-2021-38945|2024-08-04T01:51:20.382Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.1, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper content validation. IBM X-Force ID: 211238.

item.description: IBM CloudPak for Multicloud Monitoring 2.0 and 2.3 has a few containers running in privileged mode which is vulnerable to host information leakage or destruction if unauthorized access to these containers could execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 211048.

item.title: CVE-2021-38905|2024-08-04T01:51:20.617Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 could allow an authenticated user to view report pages that they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 209697.

item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 212950.

item.title: CVE-2021-38969|2024-08-04T01:51:20.828Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20virtualize
item.description: IBM Spectrum Virtualize 8.2, 8.3, and 8.4 could allow an attacker to allow unauthorized access due to the reuse of support generated credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 212609.

item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially-crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume all available CPU resources. IBM X-Force ID: 211405.

item.title: CVE-2021-39065|2024-08-04T01:58:18.079Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20copy%20data%20management
item.description: IBM Spectrum Copy Data Management 2.2.13 and earlier could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Spectrum Copy Data Management Admin Console login and uploadcertificate function . item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 5.0.0.2 behaves differently or sends different responses under different circumstances in a way that is observable to an unauthorized actor, which could facilitate username enumeration. IBM X-Force ID: 213856.

item.title: CVE-2021-38965|2024-08-04T01:51:20.906Z -- ibm -- filenet%20content%20manager
item.description: IBM FileNet Content Manager 5.5.4, 5.5.6, and 5.5.7 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 212346.

item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 209399.

item.description: IBM Spectrum Copy Data Management 2.2.13 and earlier could allow a remote attacker to access the Spring Boot console without authorization. IBM X-Force ID: 214523.

item.title: CVE-2021-39047|2024-08-04T01:58:17.699Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 and IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.1, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 214349.

item.title: CVE-2021-20556|2024-08-03T17:45:44.323Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 could allow a remote user to enumerate usernames due to differentiating error messages on existing usernames. IBM X-Force ID: 199181.

item.title: CVE-2021-20451|2024-08-03T17:37:24.306Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 196643.

item.title: CVE-2021-20450|2024-08-03T17:37:24.165Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 196640.

item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 239079.

item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 PL5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. item.description: IBM QRadar WinCollect Agent 10.0 through 10.1.2 could allow a privileged user to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 240151.

item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.

item.title: CVE-2022-43890|2024-08-03T13:40:06.707Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege%20on-premises

item.description: IBM Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.22.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user permission. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change its settings, trigger backups, restore backups, and also delete all previous backups via log rotation. IBM X-Force ID: 294994.

item.title: CVE-2024-27275|2024-08-03T11:24:02.753Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability caused by an insufficient authority requirement. A local user without administrator privilege can configure a physical file trigger to execute with the privileges of a user socially engineered to access the target file. The correction is to require administrator privilege to configure trigger support. IBM X-Force ID: 285203.

item.title: CVE-2022-34311|2024-08-03T09:07:16.034Z -- ibm -- cics%20tx%20standard
item.description: IBM CICS TX Standard and Advanced 11.1 could allow a user with physical access to the web browser to gain access to the user's session due to insufficiently protected credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 229446.

item.description: IBM CICS TX Standard and Advanced 11.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 229441.

item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics Mobile Server 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to Denial of Service due to due to weak or absence of rate limiting. item.description: IBM Security Verify Directory 10.0.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 228444.

item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. item.title: CVE-2022-22364|2024-08-03T03:14:55.079Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 is vulnerable to external service interaction attack, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. By submitting suitable payloads, an attacker can cause the application server to attack other systems that it can interact with. IBM X-Force ID: 220903.

item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.8 and 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. item.description: IBM Security QRadar EDR 3.12 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. item.title: CVE-2024-22318|2024-04-03T01:30:57.319Z -- ibm -- i%20access%20client%20solutions
item.description: IBM i Access Client Solutions (ACS) 1.1.2 through 1.1.4 and 1.1.4.3 through 1.1.9.4 is vulnerable to NT LAN Manager (NTLM) hash disclosure by an attacker modifying UNC capable paths within ACS configuration files to point to a hostile server. If NTLM is enabled, the Windows operating system will try to authenticate using the current user's session. The hostile server could capture the NTLM hash information to obtain the user's credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 279091.

item.title: CVE-2024-22359|2024-06-04T17:52:35.813Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy

This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 280897.

item.title: CVE-2024-22334|2024-06-04T17:52:36.794Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type. When deleting a custom security type, associated permissions of objects using that type may not be fully revoked. This could lead to incorrect reporting of permission configuration and unexpected privileges being retained. IBM X-Force ID: 279974.

item.description: IBM Sterling Secure Proxy 6.0.3 and 6.1.0 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 295967.

item.title: CVE-2024-39737|2024-07-15T01:27:07.662Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 296004.

item.title: CVE-2024-39731|2024-07-15T13:28:07.939Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 295970.

item.title: CVE-2024-39733|2024-07-15T13:29:31.187Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 295972.

item.title: CVE-2024-39729|2024-07-15T13:26:18.985Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from source code that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 295968.

item.title: CVE-2024-39734|2024-07-15T13:30:42.834Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 296001.

item.title: CVE-2024-39740|2024-07-15T15:53:37.563Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 displays version information in HTTP requests that could allow an attacker to gather information for future attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 296009.

item.title: CVE-2024-39736|2024-07-15T19:04:21.676Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 296003.

item.title: CVE-2024-39739|2024-07-16T13:21:59.764Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 296008.

item.title: CVE-2024-28796|2024-07-17T18:14:45.862Z -- ibm -- clearquest
item.description: IBM ClearQuest (CQ) 9.1 through 9.1.0.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. item.description: IBM ClearQuest (CQ) 9.1 through 9.1.0.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 286833.

item.title: CVE-2024-25050|2024-07-23T17:08:33.592Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 and IBM Rational Development Studio for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 networking and compiler infrastructure could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges due to an unqualified library call. A malicious actor could cause user-controlled code to run with administrator privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 283242.

item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could disclose sensitive user information to another user with physical access to the machine. IBM X-Force ID: 294727.

item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing 7.0.2 and 7.0.3 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 268749.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 297719.

item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 239079.

item.title: CVE-2022-33167|2024-07-30T17:05:35.007Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20integrator
item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. item.description: IBM Aspera Orchestrator 4.0.1 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. item.description: IBM Aspera Orchestrator 4.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 260206.

item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. item.title: CVE-2024-22312|2024-08-01T22:43:34.187Z -- ibm -- storage%20defender%20-%20resiliency%20service
item.description: IBM Storage Defender - Resiliency Service 2.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 278748.

item.title: CVE-2024-22356|2024-08-01T22:43:34.680Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 11.0.0.1 through 11.0.0.23, 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.9.0 and IBM Integration Bus for z/OS 10.1 through 10.1.0.2store potentially sensitive information in log or trace files that could be read by a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 280893.

item.title: CVE-2024-22318|2024-08-01T22:43:34.510Z -- ibm -- i%20access%20client%20solutions
item.description: IBM i Access Client Solutions (ACS) 1.1.2 through 1.1.4 and 1.1.4.3 through 1.1.9.4 is vulnerable to NT LAN Manager (NTLM) hash disclosure by an attacker modifying UNC capable paths within ACS configuration files to point to a hostile server. If NTLM is enabled, the Windows operating system will try to authenticate using the current user's session. The hostile server could capture the NTLM hash information to obtain the user's credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 279091.

item.title: CVE-2024-22334|2024-08-01T22:43:34.546Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type. When deleting a custom security type, associated permissions of objects using that type may not be fully revoked. This could lead to incorrect reporting of permission configuration and unexpected privileges being retained. IBM X-Force ID: 279974.

item.title: CVE-2024-22360|2024-08-01T22:43:34.579Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables. IBM X-Force ID: 280905.

item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.2 transmits or stores authentication credentials, but it uses an insecure method that is susceptible to unauthorized interception and/or retrieval. IBM X-Force ID: 280192.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 275774.

item.title: CVE-2023-52296|2024-08-02T22:55:41.095Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service when querying a specific UDF built-in function concurrently. IBM X-Force ID: 278547.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-08-02T22:23:44.133Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50955|2024-08-02T22:23:43.870Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated privileged user to obtain the absolute path of the web server installation which could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275777.

item.title: CVE-2023-50954|2024-08-02T22:23:44.104Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 returns sensitive information in URL information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275776.

item.title: CVE-2023-50306|2024-08-02T22:16:46.620Z -- ibm -- common%20licensing
item.description: IBM Common Licensing 9.0 could allow a local user to enumerate usernames due to an observable response discrepancy. IBM X-Force ID: 273337.

item.title: CVE-2023-50303|2024-08-02T22:16:46.548Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 273333.

item.title: CVE-2023-50307|2024-08-02T22:16:46.342Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 273338.

item.title: CVE-2023-50951|2024-08-02T22:23:44.177Z -- ibm -- qradar%20suite%20software
item.description: IBM QRadar Suite 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.17.0 and IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.11.0 in some circumstances will log some sensitive information about invalid authorization attempts. IBM X-Force ID: 275747.

item.title: CVE-2023-50311|2024-08-02T22:16:46.217Z -- ibm -- cics%20transaction%20gateway%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM CICS Transaction Gateway for Multiplatforms 9.2 and 9.3 transmits or stores authentication credentials, but it uses an insecure method that is susceptible to unauthorized interception and/or retrieval. IBM X-Force ID: 273612.

item.title: CVE-2023-50312|2024-08-02T22:16:46.070Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.2 could provide weaker than expected security for outbound TLS connections caused by a failure to honor user configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 274711.

item.title: CVE-2023-50313|2024-08-02T22:16:46.340Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5 and 9.0 could provide weaker than expected security for outbound TLS connections caused by a failure to honor user configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 274812.

item.title: CVE-2023-50953|2024-08-02T22:23:44.035Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275775.

item.title: CVE-2023-50305|2024-08-02T22:16:46.041Z -- ibm -- engineering%20requirements%20management
item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS 9.7.2.7 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 273336.

item.title: CVE-2022-38386|2024-08-03T10:54:03.704Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20security
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Security (CP4S) 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.11.0 and IBM QRadar Suite for Software 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.19.0 does not set the SameSite attribute for sensitive cookies which could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information using man-in-the-middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 233778.

item.title: CVE-2022-38383|2024-08-03T10:54:03.714Z -- ibm -- cloud%20pak%20for%20security
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Security (CP4S) 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.11.0 and IBM QRadar Software Suite 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.21.0 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 233673.

item.title: CVE-2022-38714|2024-08-03T11:02:14.515Z -- ibm -- datastage%20on%20cloud%20pak%20for%20data
item.description: IBM DataStage on Cloud Pak for Data 4.0.6 to 4.5.2 stores sensitive credential information that can be read by a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 235060.

item.title: CVE-2022-40745|2024-08-03T12:28:42.305Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.7 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information due to weaker than expected security. IBM X-Force ID: 236452.

item.title: CVE-2022-41738|2024-08-03T12:49:44.016Z -- ibm -- storage%20scale%20container%20native%20storage%20access
item.description: IBM Storage Scale Container Native Storage Access 5.1.2.1 -through 5.1.7.0 could allow an attacker to initiate connections to containers from external networks. IBM X-Force ID: 237812.

item.title: CVE-2022-41737|2024-08-03T12:49:43.776Z -- ibm -- storage%20scale%20container%20native%20storage%20access
item.description: IBM Storage Scale Container Native Storage Access 5.1.2.1 through 5.1.7.0 could allow a local attacker to initiate connections from a container outside the current namespace. IBM X-Force ID: 237811.

item.title: CVE-2024-38321|2024-08-03T18:49:24.893Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, 23.0.2, and 24.0.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files under certain situations that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 284868.
